summary: Fed up with being censored in their post-Trailer Park Boys lives, the out of work stars/world-renowned 'swearists', Mike Smith, Robb Wells and John Paul Tremblay decide to start their own uncensored network on the internet.
cast: Robb Wells|John Paul Tremblay|Mike Smith|Patrick Roach|Tom Green|Scott 'Carrot Top' Thompson|Mishael Morgan|Lou Jurgens|Shannon Leroux|Dana Michael Woods|Howard Jerome|Leigh MacInnis|Ann Pirvu|Emily Mountford|Fiona Carver|Daniel Lillford|Liam Card|Jessica Phillips|Tricia Rainone|Tanya Feifel|Dax Ravina|Kojo Afari|Calna McGoldrick|Grant MacIssac|Cory Woron|B.J. Wilson|Sebastian Bach|Bill Wood|Boomer Phillips|Dan Robertson|Nancy Regan|Michael Tassone|Tony Burnbacco|Gabrylewicz|Pat Gonsalves|Michael Conforti|Joey Iachetta|Samantha Barrett|Matt Connors|Delvin Ahde|Greg Steven Brown|John Dunsworth|Carly Marie|Robert Norman|Janine Davies|Mark Fisher|Maureen Henderson|Mandi Knight
title: Swearnet: The Movie
